title: Abhorrently slow game download?
body:
Hello all,

I played LoL some time ago and was looking to get back into it as of yesterday.

I launched my old launcher and was told it needed updating, I let that run for most of the afternoon and was finally able to launch the game last night.

After logging in, another download pops up in the top left "Downloading | Game" - I let this run for some time last night and it made little progress.
I've let it run all this morning and I'm still only at 61% - surely this must be some sort of a joke?

I downloaded a different game on another companies launcher last night that was 3x the size and it was done in about 2/3hours - in this time the LoL launcher only made around 20%?


How on earth can a company as big / monetized as Riot be unable to provide a decent download speed?
I am downloading from the Riot servers on the Riot client - I've seen multiple posts about the slow download speed spanning a large range of time - surely there must be something that can be done to improve it?

replies.body:
Welcome back, though I'm sorry the grand return has had some hiccups along the way.  :x  It sounds like you're trying to download the updated client, but getting stuck trying to reach the patching server.  There could be other factors as well like a full hard drive.  This far into patching, your network is trying to grab update files but some instability might be causing it to get stuck.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help tune up your connection.  

While I know your connection seems to be fine elsewhere, you can still have issues reaching specific servers, and that guide should help clear a path.
